data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pimvichai, Piyatida, Enghoff, Henrik, Panha, Somsak (2011): A revision of the Thyropygus allevatus group. Part 3: the T. induratus subgroup (Diplopoda: Spirostreptida: Harpagophoridae). Zootaxa 2941: 47-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.202425
